original_text: At the end of ten days it was seen that they were better in appearance and fatter in flesh than all the youths who ate the king's food.
korean_text: 열흘 후에 그들의 얼굴이 더욱 아름답고 살이 더욱 윤택하여 왕의 음식을 먹는 다른 소년들보다 더 좋아 보인지라

sentences.original_text: At the end of ten days
it was seen that they were better in appearance
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 용모가 더 좋다는 것이 보였고

sentences.original_text: than all the youths who ate the king's food
